reviews.text: ... a beautiful beach with white sand and surrounded by wide hills. There are many restaurants and cafes where you can enjoy delicious food and drinks. Super relaxing spot along the Tanjung Aan coast.

CLEAN BEACH!!!!

Parking 10k today but sunbeds were free of charge.

Definitely worth it!

Great place to relax
It's a nice beach with a good landscape but we can't swim there.
Unforgettable place! I told you if you wanna go there please take your special friend ♥️
Pantai tanjung aan is one of most beautiful beaches in world. White sand..turquoise water surrounded by green hills. Lots of little food stalls with lounge chairs.

Had an excellent seafood dinner at El Bazar last night. The octopus and squid starter, both so tender and great sides/dips. Yellow fin tuna for main, I cannot rave enough about it! Generous portion and the staff was very accommodating to replace the chips with tabouleh. The staff were all attentive. Highly recommend!!

The place is way over priced. The food is just okay but the prices are steep. Don't expect a good sangría, although it tastes okay. The royal lamb is tender but the taste is just okay. Way too pricey compared to the rest of the menu. Don't recommend it. Staff could be friendlier.

I adore this place! Everything in the menu is delicious and the portions are so big and filling. The decoration is beautiful, very Moroccan. The staff is nice and they can make most dishes vegetarian/vegan. It’s great for groups too!

We had a lovely meal here. It was our treat meal as we are on a budget and normally eat much more cheap, I am glad to say we were not disappointed. Loved the starter & main meal. Great size portion on the main very yummy flavours. Starter was fresh & we loved the tzatziki sauce, we shared the large falafel platter only suggestion is maybe extra pitta bread if there's 2 people sharing. ( as we only got 1 each) 
And a great extra we also 2 free cocktails for there bar across the road!!

The best food of this kind i've had so far! Definitely recommend it. 
Location is super cute and very clean and nice.
The food was just excellent and definitely worth it to spend a little extra money. 
Servive very attentitive and friendly!!!
very nice spartan place with fantastic staff. they help you and take care of you
Good staff! Beautiful place to stay in kuta for some days.

Very nice hotel to stay! Design is typical lombok/bungalo style with lots of plants (photos). Sri and Fred were very friendly and the breakfast was delicious.
The bungalous are very cool but in the night the surrounding can be loudy. 
Good place to stay if you dont mind a cold shower and have a deep sleep.
Also they have two cute dogs Lucky and Clinic😉

Hard to sleep at night not comfortable bed- kept waking up from noises..
I also got a bedbug infestation. Which was horrible. Had some horrible bumps on my body everywhere on my arm back sides for several days. Itchy as hell. 
I really hate this place.

Pretty bungalow and beautiful garden 
Thanks
nice palace and nice food good music
Really disapointed by the pizza which was not that good. We had to wait 1,5 hours for our pizza. The place is nice, the music too but i will not return there and i dont recommand it.
Decent place for lunch. Try their oven pizza. I would avoid their washroom though.
Awesome place with a laid back atmosphere and the best pizza I've had in indo. The spring rolls and quesadilla were awesome too. I assume you probably can't go wrong but the pizza is so damn good!

We were looking for something different than nasie/mie goering so we decided to try their pizzas.
Service was fast, we didn't have to wait to long to get our pizzas, so that was great thinking of indonesian timing

Food was good and good price.
Good place to go

Overall nice and easy place to stay for short one. There are lots of areas that needs to be improve. Especially the bathroom is quite disgusting. 

Staffs are friendly and helpful.

The room is large with clean sheets. Bath had a crack in it and shower head wouldn’t stay on the latch. The sliding door was very hard to lock. Lovely swimming pool and garden. Lots of breakfast choices and the manager was so helpful and kind. I suspect the rooms vary in quality. Bit expensive for what you get. Overall a good hotel though slightly run down.

We stayed here for 1 night only. We got the room with 'city' view.  It has a spacious space and a balcony to the pool. It is also clean and comfortable. However, they have to improve the bathroom hygiene, and corridor to the rooms. When it's hard raining, the stair and corridor become really slippery. Nevertheless, the staff are really helpful and fast response.
Great & nice hotel in kuta lombok center,,not far from many other restaurant in kuta,,good price & so friendly staff...
Fine place. Very standard. Clean and tidy, nice pool, friendly staff

Lunch here under the fans was pleasant enough. Pesto could be a bit warmer, but weather made up for it. Traffic on the "4 corners" can make for a bit too much hustle, but a "see-and-be-seen" place for sure. Steel yourself for the "table touts" in this place.
Such a lovely decoration. Love the location and the vibe. The menu is good and they serve fast. They have a few vegan options that are great. I love their breakfast and smoothies too!
The staff is incredibly friendly and wonderful and the food is equally amazing. Beautiful decor to boot
Good cafe. The ambience here is great. But a lil bit dirty. Their coffee is not the best for their price. But their food were amazing, delicious and beautiful plating.
Great coffee, amazing food, friendly staff and some of the fastest Wifi

This place is amazing! If you even remotely enjoy magic, this should be on your list of places to visit. Pay attention to the address though as it's kind of easy to miss :) The staff is wonderful, and the drinks are yummy. The magicians are professional, entertaining and good at what they do. I highly recommend the VIP/Mezzanine package. The little extra money it costs is well worth it.

Really, *really* fun. I passed by it once when it was young and I headed elsewhere, but very glad I came back to see a full show. The venue isn't too large, the staff engages you before the main event, along with well-made cocktails and good appetizers. There were 2 main acts in the signature show, and their styles were pretty different, but both used plenty of good humor in their acts. As skeptical as you may be, it's impossible not to enjoy it with wonder and plenty of laughs.
Simply worth it!
What an incredible show! Everything was amazing from the one on one tricks at the bar to the main event   I cannot recommend this place enough.  Perfect date night!

We came for my anniversary and had a fantastic time. It's like a speak easy, even the entrance is disguised, then you're escorted into another section of behind secret entrance. Just very well thought out and entertaining!!

What a wonderful place this is. Good drinks, great performances, and excellent ambiance. The food is small portioned and high price, for those who enjoy that. My only downside is that many of the magicians that come around for close-up magic seemed to focus on larger groups and pass by our two-person table. Other than that, we had a splendid time!
nice palace and nice food good music
Really disapointed by the pizza which was not that good. We had to wait 1,5 hours for our pizza. The place is nice, the music too but i will not return there and i dont recommand it.
Decent place for lunch. Try their oven pizza. I would avoid their washroom though.
Awesome place with a laid back atmosphere and the best pizza I've had in indo. The spring rolls and quesadilla were awesome too. I assume you probably can't go wrong but the pizza is so damn good!

We were looking for something different than nasie/mie goering so we decided to try their pizzas.
Service was fast, we didn't have to wait to long to get our pizzas, so that was great thinking of indonesian timing

Food was good and good price.
Good place to go
Best warung for price and quality in Kuta Lombok

Went there everyday! Had The best Indonesian food around at the best price. A vegetarian plate of mixed dishes will cost you 10k. You can add omelet fish or chicken if you want to it. Highly recommend the eggplants and the omelet. Portions are great even when you’re hungry!
Great food, awesome owner, unbeatable price. What else do you need? Go now!

Holiday for save money...? this is your  choice for food... Cheap but amazing taste.. specialy with magic sauce.. yeahhh.. 
   BIG TASTE little PRICE..

I will always call this warung "the best place where to eat". It made nasi campur to be my favorite food of all time. I have tasted many types of this food in Lombok and other Indonesian islands but this Javanese version is absolutely the best.
Conversation with very pleasant owner, Mohajir, enhance wonderful experience.
